Cambridge Clock Tower to be restored https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/cambridge-clock-tower-to-be-restored/MLDSIEKEWVFITPT3P7WVTGYOQI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/cambridge-clock-tower-to-be-restored/MLDSIEKEWVFITPT3P7WVTGYOQI/ The Westminster chimes sequence – the same used by Big Ben in London – will be back. Photo / Danielle Zollickhofer

Weather: Auckland gets showers, strong winds; snow for Central Otago as temperatures plummet https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-auckland-gets-showers-strong-winds-snow-for-central-otago-as-temporals-plummet/OZH6NMUD3BHAXJDMVRYT2DAQZA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-auckland-gets-showers-strong-winds-snow-for-central-otago-as-temporals-plummet/OZH6NMUD3BHAXJDMVRYT2DAQZA/ Raphael FranksA rush of cold air moving up from the southwest on Tuesday will push temperatures down. Mon, 11 Dec 2023 03:21:06 +0000 MetService forecast cloudy periods for Auckland on Tuesday, with isolated showers in the morning and strong winds. Wednesday, meanwhile, would be mostly cloudy and showery before becoming fine in the evening, when winds should also ease. Photo / Alex Burton
